hi all, I just upgraded to hoary but no: does sound work with anything else?
the rest of the sistem is playing well
killall esd, close and reopen totem, and see if that makes a difference

it's probably because gnome 2.9 with hoary runs the enlightenment sound daemon by default and afaik totem won't output to esd. It'll be trying alsa, and since alsa is locked (by esd), it doesn't give you sound
if you start it (or xmms, if you have xmms set to alsa output) from a terminal you'll see all of the alsa breakage messages.
you can either configure xmms to output via esd (in preferences) or tell gnome not to start esd
mh so I got to make totem work with esd, or yea that
the one disadvantage of removing esd is that you only have one sound source at a time.
THere's an option in gnome's sounds configuration screen for 'sound daemon' - I can't remember the exact wording of it.
I would just like to say THanks to the laptop team
:).. I like it. Glad your sound now works ;)
